backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling menu items, transactions, and gift cards with add/edit/remove, sorting, and payment recording logic.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature-to-file mapping documenting which frontend files implement each POS feature for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON object summarizing the purpose of each frontend file for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining the app’s color system, themes, and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app and mounting it to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing tab navigation and routing between POS, menu, gift cards, transactions, and receipts.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error display component with message, icon, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, branding, and shared page structure.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutD: Checkout modal implementing fake cash, gift card, and simulated card payments with validation and transaction submission.
frontend/src/features/checkout/Simulated: A simulated card entry form with basic formatting and validation that reports validity to a parent component.
frontend/src/features/giftcards/GiftCard: Provides interfaces to issue new gift cards and look up existing ones using hooks for API operations.
Dialog form for creating or editing menu items with validation for name, price, and optional category.
frontend/src/features/menu/MenuManagemen: Displays menu items with options to add, edit, and delete using form dialogs and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/features/pos/POSScreen.tsx: Point‑of‑sale interface that lets users add menu items to a cart, modify quantities, and proceed to checkout.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptSc: Renders a printable receipt for a completed transaction and allows navigating back to the POS.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Displays a transaction history table using stored transactions and allows viewing individual receipts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteTransactio: Sends completed transactions to the backend and stores them locally with a generated receipt ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftCards.ts: Provides mutations for issuing, retrieving, and using gift cards through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenu.ts: Fetches and mutates menu items through the backend actor, invalidating menu queries on changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode settings, and print-specific rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/transactionsStore.ts: Zustand store persisting transaction history with methods to add and clear transactions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current POS app state, including versioning, feature list, image requirements, and architectural notes. Describes existing features like menu management, checkout with fake payments, gift cards, and receipts.
